WGS module¶

WGS 84 coordinate system. North-East-Down reference is employed.

It converts (lat, lon) in degrees to (x, y) in meters given a specific origin. The selected origin is at Nidarosdomen in Trondheim.

Example

>>> wgs = WGS()
>>> x, y = wgs.latlon2xy(63.42690974, 10.3969373)
>>> print(x, y)
>>> 0.0, 0.0
>>> x, y = 1000, 2000
>>> lat, lon = wgs.xy2latlon(x, y)
>>> print(lat, lon)
>>> 63.43589289658141 10.437112521492383
